entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
